CatDescriptText: Cutline of related article published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, June 5, 1954, page 1 reads: "...Courier's gala third annual Home Service Fair slated for Hunt Armory June 10,11 and 12..."
TitMainTitle: Man at microphone on stage with fifteen women, including Daisy Lampkin, third from left, Wilhelmina Byrd Brown, sixth from left, and Jessie Vann on right, in Hunt Armory for the 1954 Pittsburgh Courier Home Service Fair

(Daisy Elizabeth), 1882-1965.Brown, Wilhelmina Byrd.Vann, Jessie, 1889-1967.
